title: Zenonzard The Animation Episode 0
synopsis: The year 20XX. Humans called "Concodes" and ultra-high-performance AI called "Codeman" team up as buddies to compete in the card battle game ZENOZARD. People are going wild with excitement at the world championships, THE ZENON.
characters: ['Lash, Eilietta', 'Azuma, Souta', 'Claude, Ash', 'Yorraiha, Yorusuke', 'Minamino, Ruri', 'Saionji, Shion']
voices: ['Hayami, Saori', 'Shimazaki, Nobunaga', 'Umehara, Yuuichirou', 'Tachibana, Shinnosuke', 'Fairouz, Ai', 'Han, Megumi']
